mapper.sql: t.ID, t.GROUPS_STR, t.GROUPS_STR_XJ, t.GROUPIDS_STR, t.GROUPIDS_STR_XJ, t.CHECK_GROUP_ID, t.CHECK_START_TIME, t.CHECK_END_TIME, t.AMOUNT, t.REAL_COUNT, t.DIS_COUNT, t.LATE_COUNT, t.CREATED, t.CREATER, t.UPDATED, t.UPDATER, t.DEL_FLAG
mapper.select: select , g.name as "group_name" from SF_INSPECTION t left join sys_Group g on g.id = t.check_Group_Id where t.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into SF_INSPECTION (ID, GROUPS_STR, GROUPS_STR_XJ, GROUPIDS_STR, GROUPIDS_STR_XJ, CHECK_GROUP_ID, CHECK_START_TIME, CHECK_END_TIME, AMOUNT, REAL_COUNT, DIS_COUNT, LATE_COUNT, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupsStrXj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupidsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupidsStrXj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{disCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update SF_INSPECTION
GROUPS_STR = #{groupsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPS_STR_XJ = #{groupsStrXj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPIDS_STR = #{groupidsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPIDS_STR_XJ = #{groupidsStrXj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_GROUP_ID = #{checkGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_START_TIME = #{checkStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECK_END_TIME = #{checkEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REAL_COUNT = #{realCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DIS_COUNT = #{disCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATE_COUNT = #{lateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_INSPECTION set GROUPS_STR = #{groupsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPS_STR_XJ = #{groupsStrXj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPIDS_STR = #{groupidsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPIDS_STR_XJ = #{groupidsStrXj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_GROUP_ID = #{checkGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_START_TIME = #{checkStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECK_END_TIME = #{checkEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REAL_COUNT = #{realCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIS_COUNT = #{disCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LATE_COUNT = #{lateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select , g.name as "group_name" from SF_INSPECTION t left join sys_Group g on g.id = t.check_Group_Id
order by ${orderStr}

sql.if: AND exists ( select t2.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupidsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) t2 where t.GROUPIDS_STR=t2.id)

if.test: sysGroup != null and sysGroup.name != '' and sysGroup.name != null
